title: Contains Duplicate
description:
Given an integer array `nums`, return `true` if any value appears **at least twice** in the array, and return `false` if every element is distinct.

## Approach

You can solve this using a hash set to track seen elements, or by sorting the array and checking adjacent elements.

examples.explanation: The element 1 occurs at the indices 0 and 3.
Multiple elements appear more than once.
